newsitem.title: USA: Harmon Indus has large GE contract.
newsitem.headline: Harmon Indus has large GE contract.

text.p: Harmon Industries Inc said Thursday it won a major new cab-signaling contract with General Electric Transportation Systems, a unit of General Electric Co.

Harmon, a supplier of signal and train control equipment for railroad and rail transit systems, will provide GE with 150 multi-territory Ultra Cab II units for installation in the latest model of that company's AC traction locomotives.
